title: Mindful Productivity: Focus in a Distracted World

content.title: The Myth of Multitasking
contents: In our quest to stay productive, we often try to do everything at once. But studies show that multitasking reduces efficiency and increases stress. Mindful productivity is about doing one thing at a time, with total focus.
When you bring your full presence to a task, you not only complete it faster but also with higher quality.
